Message.Msg: overvalues? Next few day ? You had too much to drink, my friend. Or the Suschi got to your head and immobilized it.

Message.Title: Commuter Train Wreck Injures Dozens, Halts Amtrak Service***
Message.Msg: Government can not keep train on track and another train hits derailed train. I guess someone did not get out in time with their lantern to flag down the on coming train. Amtrak is being ran like the post office and both need to be sold off. http://www.bloomberg.com/news/2013-05-18/commuter-train-derailment-halts-amtrak-s-new-york-boston.html
